name: Giuseppe, The Soul Collector
description:
This game is made for Mini Jam 92: Death

The limitation is:  Your health is your weapon

Interpretation:

  • Since this is a typing game, the more health the character has, the more score you will get.
Goal:
  • The goal of this game is to type names as much as you can, as fast as you can, the faster you are, the more health you will have, the more score you will get.
  • The total souls is there only to tell you how much souls you have acquired.
Game Background:
  • An incident has happened, a lot of souls are lost, from different countries, on different timelines are wandering in a forest, you take the opportunity to take souls for yourself.
Mechanics: 
  • Type as much of names that is shown, every second and every mistype is a decrease of Health, overtime the decrease will increase. 
  • Press Spacebar to pause the game.
Features:
  • More than 100 names from different countries, fantasies, etc.
  • Music that gets you typing! :D
  • When your typing is accurate, you will get on a streak that  doubles the health and score  acquired.
Credits:
  • Sky
  • RedoxGames
  • SamuelLee
